sourcesContent:
<template>
    <select v-model="box_in">
        <option value="M1">Mario</option>
        <option value="M2">Rickroll</option>
        <option value="M3">My heart will go on</option>
        <option value="M4">Epic sax guy</option>
    </select>
         
    <button @click = "clicked()">Submit</button>

</template>

<script>
  export default {
    data() {
      return {
        box_in: '',
      }
    },
    methods:{
      clicked() {
        if(this.box_in == ''){
          this.submitBut()
          return
        }
      }, 
      async submitBut(){
          console.log('submitted, button')
          const request = {
            type: 'MusicSelection',
            arguments: this.box_in,
          }
          
          await axios 
            .post('/api/input/', request)
            .then(response =>{
              console.log(response)
              this.showBar("Submission accepted. You will now be redirected home", 'G')
              setTimeout(this.redirectHome, 2500)
            }).catch(error => {
              console.log(error)
              this.showBar("Server error. Please try again later.",'')
            })
          },
    }
  }
</script>
